events.text:
...
This is all so confusing!
So I am Lilian.
My own mother.
And Riley was the strange woman that visited me that day.
She gave me Lilia- I man my own diary of lunatic rambling and made me believe I was Roseline.
Riley and the prince took advantage of me when I wasn't in the right state of mind.
... 
How could they?!
Something tells me that Riley, or what ever she became after using that failed serum lays behind that door.
Let's take it down.
